name: The Pumpkening
description:
The Pumpkening is a Halloween themed action platformer with boss battles

It is a difficult physic based platformer with many enemies and traps. Boss fight element inspired by cuphead. 

There are 8 levels right now, 5 and 8 are boss battles. Game is about 1 - 2 hours long.

This is my smaller special side project for halloween, I didn't have more time before the halloween that is why it is not very long, but I may release some updates in the future with different kind of levels, more boss battles and overally more content.
